concept.description: Set the level property of a package, e.g. 1 for de, 2 for de.kontext_e and so on.
concept.cypher: MATCH (p:Java:Package) WITH SPLIT(p.fqn,".") AS splitted, p SET p.level=SIZE(splitted) RETURN p.fqn, p.level

concept.description: Add a DEPENDS_ON relationship to parents of a package P from other packages up to the same level of the source package.
concept.cypher: MATCH (p:Java:Package)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(p2:Java:Package), (parent:Java:Package)-[:CONTAINS*]->(p2:Java:Package) WHERE p.level <= parent.level CREATE UNIQUE (p)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(parent) RETURN p.fqn, parent.fqn
